howTo.title: How to Use Breaks
howTo.text: Take a breather and enjoy a combination of movement, meditation, or breathwork videos tailored to your current need. You can either select recommended guided videos each time it’s your break time or browse all videos in the Breaks Library.

description: Take a breather and enjoy a combination of movement, meditation, or breathwork videos tailored to your current need. You can either select recommended guided videos each time it’s your break time or browse all videos in the Breaks Library.
no_breaks_taken_message: You haven't taken any breaks... yet.
no_saved_breaks_message: You haven't saved any breaks... yet.
hey_looks_like_you_could_use_breather: Hey! Looks like you could use a breather.
